titleStmt.title: A Batchelers resolution, or, Have among you now, widowes or maydes ... to the tune of The blazing torch.

notesStmt.note: Publisher and date suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Right half of sheet contains "The second part. To the same tune."
Imperfect: stained, creased and torn, with loss of print. Best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in: Pepys Library.
